Class SocketHandler

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.socket.handler.AbstractWebSocketHandler
org.springframework.web.socket.handler.TextWebSocketHandler
com.example.webrtcvideochat.socket.SocketHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketHandler
@Component public class SocketHandler extends org.springframework.web.socket.handler.TextWebSocketHandler
The main method that implements TextWebSocketHandler to send messages to WebRTC
